title: Training on Utilizing Deep Learning Models for Predicting Delirium in ICU Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Analysis and ICU Work Experience, Understanding Basic Machine Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-Oriented Training for ICU Nurses and Medical Staff. Includes Individual Device-Based Data Analysis Practice and Team-Based Projects

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles and data processing workflows of delirium prediction models for ICU patients
Learners conduct practical exercises to calculate 12-hour delirium risk probabilities using RNN-based deep learning models
Learners interpret model predictions based on medical data and propose strategies for applying them to clinical decision-making
Learners design and present model improvement plans optimized for ICU environments through project-based learning

resources: Delirium Assessment Scale (Confusion Assessment Method) Document

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
